Articles.Content:
well a bit after i finished my first stock landing on eve, i decided i was going to beging my remembrance series of rocket (will be uploaded in more detail later.), my second rocket in the series i am just ready for launch when the first stage goes, i forget to throttle up then chaos insues to the point of a leaning tower of debris is left.

DANG IT FORUMS...

yes i want to post screenshots, but the forums is still abit buggered, so i guess you will want to soon see, pics i will try quite abit to do it, also i will add the link to the remembrance series of rockets when it is up.

[ATTACH=CONFIG]33278[/ATTACH][ATTACH=CONFIG]33276[/ATTACH][ATTACH=CONFIG]33277[/ATTACH]
